name: Orb Boy
description:
Orb Boy - A puzzle game about building bridges with shadows

----------------

Q: What is Orb Boy?

A: A game

---------------

Q: Yes, but about what?

A: In Orb Boy you navigate a glowing lampion around different objects to manipulate their shadows.

Only by finding the right position in the room you can build a shadow bridge hat can carry a group of darkling’s safely across the levels to their goal. 

----------------

Controls: 
- WASD to move
- Space to start 

----------------

Game Prototype for Waltzing Game Jam 2018.

The theme we chose was:

* Light & Darkness
